title: cannot use RustcEncodable when rustc_serialize is aliased
body:
I tried this code:

``` rust
extern crate rustc_serialize as serialize;

#[derive(RustcEncodable)]
pub struct Hello {
    a: u64
}

```

I expected the code to compile, instead I saw these errors

```
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:25 error: failed to resolve. Maybe a missing `extern crate rustc_serialize`? [E0433]
src/lib.rs:3 #[derive(RustcEncodable)]
                      ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 note: in this expansion of #[derive_RustcEncodable] (defined in src/lib.rs)
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:25 help: run `rustc --explain E0433` to see a detailed explanation
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 error: use of undeclared trait name `rustc_serialize::Encodable` [E0405]
src/lib.rs:3 #[derive(RustcEncodable)]
                      ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 note: in this expansion of #[derive_RustcEncodable] (defined in src/lib.rs)
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 help: run `rustc --explain E0405` to see a detailed explanation
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:25 error: failed to resolve. Maybe a missing `extern crate rustc_serialize`? [E0433]
src/lib.rs:3 #[derive(RustcEncodable)]
                      ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 note: in this expansion of #[derive_RustcEncodable] (defined in src/lib.rs)
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:25 help: run `rustc --explain E0433` to see a detailed explanation
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 error: use of undeclared trait name `rustc_serialize::Encoder` [E0405]
src/lib.rs:3 #[derive(RustcEncodable)]
                      ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 note: in this expansion of #[derive_RustcEncodable] (defined in src/lib.rs)
src/lib.rs:3:10: 3:24 help: run `rustc --explain E0405` to see a detailed explanation
error: aborting due to 4 previous errors
```

When I removed alias for `rustc_serialize` everything compiled fine.

``` rust
extern crate rustc_serialize;

#[derive(RustcEncodable)]
pub struct Hello {
    a: u64
}
```

I assume, that this is caused by hardcoded path to `rustc_serialize`.

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/97ba52ec379e17cc0984224b756282b68bc3a53b/src/libsyntax/ext/deriving/mod.rs#L166-L168

``` rust
    "RustcEncodable" => encodable::expand_deriving_rustc_encodable,
```

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/219eca11b044de3644b3e9101124513c1a842b09/src/libsyntax/ext/deriving/encodable.rs#L100-L107

``` rust
pub fn expand_deriving_rustc_encodable(cx: &mut ExtCtxt,
                                       span: Span,
                                       mitem: &MetaItem,
                                       item: &Annotatable,
                                       push: &mut FnMut(Annotatable))
{
    expand_deriving_encodable_imp(cx, span, mitem, item, push, "rustc_serialize")
}
```

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/219eca11b044de3644b3e9101124513c1a842b09/src/libsyntax/ext/deriving/encodable.rs#L134-L136

``` rust
fn expand_deriving_encodable_imp(cx: &mut ExtCtxt,
                                 span: Span,
                                 mitem: &MetaItem,
                                 item: &Annotatable,
                                 push: &mut FnMut(Annotatable),
                                 krate: &'static str)
{
    if cx.crate_root != Some("std") {
        // FIXME(#21880): lift this requirement.
        cx.span_err(span, "this trait cannot be derived with #![no_std] \
                           or #![no_core]");
        return;
    }

    let trait_def = TraitDef {
        span: span,
        attributes: Vec::new(),
        path: Path::new_(vec!(krate, "Encodable"), None, vec!(), true),
        additional_bounds: Vec::new(),
```
